sentences.sContent: Add fertilizer to enrich the soil.
Education can greatly enrich your life.
sentences.sCn: 教育可以大大充实生活。

remMethod.val: en(使…) + rich(富有的) → 使富裕

words.tran: 丰富；改进；肥沃；发财致富

trans.tranCn: 充实， 使丰富； 使富裕
trans.tranOther: to improve the quality of something, especially by adding things to it
